required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of Compliant Behaviors and Associated Factors of Women Breast Screening
clinical_study.official_title: A Study of Compliant Behaviors and Associated Factors of Women Breast Screening in the Shuang Ho Region of Taipei City.

collaborator.agency: Taipei Medical University Shuang Ho Hospital

brief_summary.textblock: There were a breast cancer screening activity in Taipei Medical University-Shuang Ho Hospital. We did an intervention with woman who joined the activity.The most important part in the intervention was to know health behavior about the breast cancer prevention.By doing the study, the investigators will know how to promote the health activity in our community.

detailed_description.textblock: When the investigators get these women's health behavior imagination, the investigators can know how much breast cancer screening activity do these people have. The most important part for us is to understand how to promote health behavior to women who live around Shuang area.

arm_group.description: Women who live in the Shuang Ho Region of Taipei City. Women can read and write chinese language.

study_pop.textblock: The women live in the Shuang Ho Region of Taipei City

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. women
2. can read words
Exclusion Criteria:

overall_official.affiliation: Cancer Center of Taipei Medical University Shuang Ho Hospital

responsible_party.organization: Cancer Center of Taipei Medical University WanFang Hospital
